alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford and northeastern Alachua Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Gainesville Airport, or near Gainesville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Keystone Heights, Orange Heights, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Sampson, Waldo and Hampton. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
